title: PayU, NPCI join hands to roll out Credit Lines on UPIâ€™ feature
description: PayU has partnered with NPCI to roll out the 'Credit Lines on UPI' feature on its platform, aiming to provide financial security and growth for merchants. The integration will enable pre-sanctioned credit lines by banks through UPI, empowering businesses and consumers. PayU expects over 380 million UPI users to have easier access to Credit Lines.
